# Preparation

We know that ....

> penguins are cute!

... so we will work with some `penguins` data today.

::: callout-note
Note we have now the `palmerpenguin` data as an alternative to the famous `iris` data.
:::

For more information on the penguins data visit Allison Horst's Github page <https://allisonhorst.github.io/palmerpenguins/>

:::{.callout-caution collapse="true"}

## Expand to learn more about where the data was collected.

Data was collected and made available by Dr. Kristen Gorman and the palmer station, Antartica LTER, a member of the Long Term Ecological Research Network.

:::
